unnormalised: Did you know the average Indian household uses approx. 200 units of electricity per month? Keep an eye on your bill; if it suddenly jumps to 500 units, investigate potential leaks or faulty appliances.
normalised: Did you know the average Indian household uses approximately two hundred units of electricity per month? Keep an eye on your bill; if it suddenly jumps to five hundred units, investigate potential leaks or faulty appliances.
